about_the_game:
This International Electric carpet tracks expansion pack gives you five excellent NEW tracks for indoor 1:10 and 1:12 electric on-road racing. The package includes the renowned Lausanne track (Switzerland), MB Models raceway (United Kingdom) and specially designed tracks created by 1:10 ISTC superstar Ronald Volker and others.

IMPORTANT: Three tracks are already available now, and the other two will be released in April - May 2017. Each track will be automatically added to your account as soon as it is released if you buy this DLC. The idea is that you don't have to wait for them to enjoy the other three tracks now!

  • Lausanne (available now)
  • VRC Carpet 4 Volker design (available now)
  • VRC Carpet indoor JPH (available now)
  • VRC Carpet indoor FB (coming soon)
  • MB Models raceway (coming soon)

Enjoy your VRC PRO indoor carpet racing experience!

See you at the virtual race track.

*Your support of the VRC Pro project is much appreciated. By buying this upgrade you enable us to keep developing new cars, new tracks and new game features which make VRC Pro even better than it already is!
detailed_description:
This International Electric carpet tracks expansion pack gives you five excellent NEW tracks for indoor 1:10 and 1:12 electric on-road racing. The package includes the renowned Lausanne track (Switzerland), MB Models raceway (United Kingdom) and specially designed tracks created by 1:10 ISTC superstar Ronald Volker and others.

IMPORTANT: Three tracks are already available now, and the other two will be released in April - May 2017. Each track will be automatically added to your account as soon as it is released if you buy this DLC. The idea is that you don't have to wait for them to enjoy the other three tracks now!

  • Lausanne (available now)
  • VRC Carpet 4 Volker design (available now)
  • VRC Carpet indoor JPH (available now)
  • VRC Carpet indoor FB (coming soon)
  • MB Models raceway (coming soon)

Enjoy your VRC PRO indoor carpet racing experience!

See you at the virtual race track.

*Your support of the VRC Pro project is much appreciated. By buying this upgrade you enable us to keep developing new cars, new tracks and new game features which make VRC Pro even better than it already is!

name: VRC PRO Deluxe Carpet tracks

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: VRC PRO International Electric carpet tracks Deluxe - $10.99

package_groups.title: Buy VRC PRO Deluxe Carpet tracks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP 3, .Net framework 3.5
  • Processor: Hyperthreaded Intel CPU, AMD Athlon 64 CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB Pixel Shader 2.0 graphics card (nVidia GeForce FX 5600 or ATI Radeon X600)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Windows 8, .Net framework 3.5
  • Processor: Multi-core CPU (Intel Core i5 or i7, AMD Phenom II QUAD X4)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB dedicated RAM, Pixel Shader 3.0 graphics card (AMD Radeon HD 5870, nVidia GTX 560)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: VRC USB adapter or controller, for hosting multiplayer sessions high upstream connection is recommended

short_description: This International Electric carpet tracks expansion pack gives you five excellent NEW tracks for indoor 1:10 and 1:12 electric on-road racing. The package includes the renowned Lausanne track (Switzerland), MB Models raceway (United Kingdom) and specially designed tracks created by 1:10 ISTC superstar Ronald Volker and others.
